string-array.item: Press on search icon to get started
Enter a query which should be a movie title, if your query is correct you will be shown suggestions, tap on any suggestion to view that movie.
If you hit search button in the soft keyboard you will be shown movies from all suggestions created from your query.

To filter based on movie or serial, tap on the floating action button to make a selection, by default all results are shown to you; if you wish to filter based on movie or series please select the appropriate filter.
The selected filter will be applied until you explicitly change it.
Enter multiple queries separated by a "__" (double underscore) delimiter.
After entering multiple movie title\'s separated with "__" press search button in soft keyboard to get all movies with those keywords.
Results from multiple queries(movie title\'s) will be concatenated, to see movie results for all queries keep scrolling until you find it.
